Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute at 51st/Campbell
ShortDescription: 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 55th, Western and 51st: due to, street blockage near 51st/Campbell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 55th, Western and 51st: due to, street blockage near 51st/Campbell.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute near 61st/Eberhart

Headline: Howard-bound Red and Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red and Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running with delays near Armitage due to track work.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red and Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running with delays near Armitage due to track work.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #72 North Temporary Eastbound Reroute near North Ave/Cicero
ShortDescription: Eastbound 72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Ave, Cicero, Division, Kostner and North Ave, due to street blockage near North Ave/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Ave, Cicero, Division, Kostner and North Ave, due to street blockage near North Ave/Cicero.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
